name: Giant Bomb: 10 Years of micro games
name_original: Giant Bomb: 10 Years of micro games
description:
My WarioWare inspired micro game collection for the 2018 Giant Rom game jam. Jan Pack'ed with 7 exciting micro games! That's right, 7! 7 games for 7 years of gian... I ran out of time ok.

I also noticed a spelling mistake in there after I submitted it so... please ignore that. 

I used a bunch of audio from Freesound.org which I will credit soon.
